dmca.title: [EV1-C1425584K] DMCA ISP Notification audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, October 18, 2006 6:18 AM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: [EV1-C1425584K] DMCA ISP Notification audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder Subject: [EV1-C1425584K] DMCA ISP Notification audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. DMCA ISP Notification audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder Added by system at Wednesday, Oct 18 2006 10:17 am X-MailFrom: bdavis@netenforcers.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [207.218.192.105] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Oct 18 11:16:37 2006 Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net (SMTP32) id A00000784; Wed, 18 Oct 2006 11:15:32 -0500 Received: from mx04.filter.theplanet.com [207.218.221.230] by mail.ev1.net with ESMTP (SMTPD32-6.06) id A303B51400E2; Wed, 18 Oct 2006 11:15:29 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 18 Oct 2006 11:16:28 -0500 Received: from [69.25.50.217] (helo=ms17.mse9.exchange.ms) by mx04.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from bdavis@netenforcers.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GaB0j-0007el-Q6 for abuse@ev1.net; Wed, 18 Oct 2006 07:59:05 -0500 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; type="multipart/alternative"; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6F2B5.7E18A572" Subject: DMCA ISP Notification audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder Date: Wed, 18 Oct 2006 09:01:15 -0400 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: DMCA ISP Notification audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder Thread-Index: AcbytX5pJyH3/8JySZG9iRB1SUTE8Q== From: "Barbara Davis" To: Cc: X-Declude-Sender: bdavis@netenforcers.com [207.218.221.230] X-Spam-Tests-Failed: None [0] X-Note: This E-mail was sent from mx04.filter.theplanet.com ([207.218.221.230]). (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) 10/18/2006 7155 5474 4100 4346 4372 VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED Everyones Internet Chris Newcomb 390 Benmar Dr. Ste. 200, Houston, TX. 77060 Re: Unauthorized Use of Sony'S Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials Dear Designated Agent: We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc. to contact you with respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials. Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials. Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter. Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. § 512 (c)(3)(A) and 15 U.S.C. § 1125(a) and 1114 et seq, we hereby notify you of Sony's good faith belief that your client, audioresolution.com, at the URL www.audioresolution.com, is using Sony trademarks and/or copyrighted materials without authorization by Sony, its agents, or the law, specifically with respect to camcorder products sold by Sony's Personal Mobile Imaging Division. Sony has a good faith belief that the information contained in this letter is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Sony. The specific works, graphics or other material Sony believes to be infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are copyrighted images from Sony's website. Specific violations of copyrighted images by audioresolution.com are listed below this paragraph. http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4831/99231_hi8_handycam_2_5_lcd_20x_op.html http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4840/99236_sony_8mm_digital_camcorder.html http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4827/94584_sony_hdv_handycam_camcorder.html http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4829/98465_sony_dvd_handycam_camcorder.html http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4843/99282_sony_minidv_camcorder.html There are various additional locations of infringement on www.audioresolution.com website. The above list is a specific sample of some of these, but all infringements need to be addressed. Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(1)(C), Sony hereby demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an expeditious manner. If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com. All communications should be in writing. Sony has authorized Net Enforcers to handle and resolve this matter with you. Please do not contact Sony directly, as Sony will simply refer the matter back to Net Enforcers. If your designated agent or representation does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 10/27/2006, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and we will proceed accordingly. Sincerely, VCLM Law Lance C. Venable Attorney at Law LCV/roc Barbara Davis LMS Manager Net Enforcers Inc. BDavis@netenforcers.com compliance.management@netenforcers.com The Online Enforcement Specialists...... Statement of Confidentiality The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you. MIME element (text/html)

 

10/18/2006

7155 5474 4100 4346 4372

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

Everyones Internet

Chris Newcomb

390 Benmar Dr. Ste. 200,

Houston, TX. 77060
